name: The Twenty One
description: 《灵魂筹码:契约》是一款生存恐怖对战游戏。这是一场一旦坐上牌桌便无法回头的赌局，为了取胜所要付出的代价远超想象，你需要通过合作才能逃离这越陷越深的泥潭。不过要小心，你将面对的敌人并不只有恶灵，而你要合作的也不仅仅是人类同伴……

name: The Excavation of Hob's Barrow
description: The Excavation of Hob's Barrow is a folk horror narrative-driven adventure. Explore the isolated moors of rural Victorian England as you uncover the mysteries of Hob's Barrow. The answers lie in the soil...

name: Third Wild
description: Survive, fight, build your buildings, and go on an adventure in a medieval open world with monsters and strange areas for you to explore.

name: Guarding Goddess
description: The demon army is invading and the Goddess is in danger! At the most critical moment, you lead many heroes, equip the artifacts and fight for the Goddess! Together with your friends, fight against the demon army and become a legend in the pantheon!

name: Enionax
description:
Walk through the various eras of platformers with humour thanks to Enionax.

Go from black and white games to unmanageable patchless games! Go through all these eras again with humour.

name: Trespasser 2
description: A first-person action horror game about breaking into your enemy's house and seeking vengeance for the torment you have received in your past.

name: Paper Bride 3
description: Paper Bride 3 is a Chinese horror mystery puzzle game. This time the story takes place in Moshui Village, which is near Zangling Village, and Fulu City, a small town nearby.

name: Sushi Rush
description: This is a revolving sushi management game, you need to prepare the right sushi for your guests, within the guest's budget, by matching different kinds of sushi, as much as possible to satisfy the guests.

name: Happiness Double Room
description: The summer has come to an end. You've been kidnapped by a sister you've known for a long time. Leave all your troubles, stresses and worries behind. Live a happy life with your sister in the next few weeks!

name: Heart Fragment: Book Two - Belief Fragments
description:
Includes Lana and Shannon's routes.

Your established bond with your best friend Shannon makes you hesitant to open up to her about your struggles. Not out of any desire to hide things - you just don't want Shannon to be dragged into a potentially dangerous situation.

Meanwhile, you haven't seen Lana in ten years; not since the death of your mother. Lana looks a bit different now with her dyed pink hair but she's still the same caring girl with a bit of a wild side that you remember from your youth.

Book Two focuses on the reality of things, dealing with matters at a surface level. If you strip away fantasy and leave only belief in those around you behind, what answers will you be able to find?

name: Valkyrie Elysium
description: A young Valkyrie who is entrusted with the fate of the world by the All-Father, the highest of gods and ruler of all creation, will face various enemies on her quest and must utilize a variety of weapons, magic and the power of her allies to prevent Ragnarok - the destruction of the world.

developers.name: Square Enix Creative Business Unit IV

name: NeverAwake
description: A girl who never wakes up. She has been fighting monsters in her dreams... "NeverAwake" is a nightmarish twin-stick shooter with a unique worldview and original game rules.

name: WTC: Relentless Protagonist [SxS]
description: Grendel and her "friend" must work together to find a way out of a strange school, where pupils and teachers alike are being killed

name: Deathverse: Let It Die
description: Players take the stage in the world’s most popular survival reality TV show, set hundreds of years after the events of Let it Die. Armed with a robotic combat tool equipped with many deadly features, each player can use a variety of weapons, protective shields, and skills to create a character who can outlive the competition. They’ll also have to fend off monsters and assassins to stay alive in this gloriously gory arena.

name: Destroyer: The U-Boat Hunter
description: Destroyer: the U-Boat Hunter is an interactive war thriller which seamlessly blends tactical WW2 anti-submarine warfare simulation with a gripping storyline. Take command of a meticulously reconstructed Fletcher-class destroyer and lead your crew against nazi U-boats in the Battle of the Atlantic!

name: Criminal Dissidia
description: This game is a secondary style card + strategy +RPG+Rogulike independent game.Any level challenge + random map + random monsters + hidden points + wizard system + various props backpack + skills to develop + card magic integration, play your brain, together with liver this game.

name: ValiDate: Struggling Singles in your Area
description:
ValiDate is a visual novel about thirteen struggling singles navigating through soul-sucking 9-to-5s, quarter-life crises, and the harsh truths millennials learn as soon as they hit their 20's.

Set in the Jercy City area, our cast of lovers trudge through the dregs of capitalism - a journey, a transition - a rite-of-passage that leads into uncertain mid-adulthood. On one side but not yet out on the other, 13 playable characters find romance amongst cosplay, trash mixtapes, and even poetry straight from the soul.

With over 30 routes to choose from and hours of content, the lives of these singles are in your good (or bad!) decision-making hands.

name: Hentai: Nazi Girl
description: HENTAI: NAZI GIRL is a satirical 3rd person shooter where you play as a sexy naked girl. You will have to destroy the enemies, evil and dangerous, also go to their base, where you need to kill everyone (unexpectedly, right?), you need to collect propaganda posters (and they contain jokes with elements of black humor, be sure to read it). After collecting all the propaganda posters, you need to find the hidden invitation to the club. And then a new big enemy will appear and you will be allowed to destroy the eyes lying on the ground, which indicate a connection with the enemy.

name: The Legend of Heroes: Trails from Zero - Limited Edition
description: The Limited Edition includes The Legend of Heroes: Trails from Zero - Deluxe Edition, "SSS Classified Files" Hardcover Art Book, "Anthems of Crossbell" Official Soundtrack (10 Select Tracks), "Special Support Section, Assemble!" Cloth Poster (17” x 24”), "Heroes of Zero" Acrylic Stand, Steelbook and Collector's Box.

name: Pokémon Recharged Yellow
description: Pokemon Recharged Yellow is a fully completed GBA ROM hack made by Jaizu. Embark on an exciting journey through a more challenging Kanto region, redesigned in the Generation 3 style. Hang out with your buddy Pikachu, have fun with the Pokémon you meet, collect gym badges, and take on Team Rocket, featuring Jessie, James, and Meowth.

name: My Devilish Contract
description: You follow the story of a boy who lacks self-confidence. He can't even muster up the courage to ask a girl out. One day, he happens to find a book in the attic. He decides to open the dark and suspicious book and inside, he finds a spell that can "grant any wish." He reads the spell out loud and a puff of black smoke spews from the book. Out of the smoke, a demon appears.

name: TheHunter: Call of the Wild - Assorted Sidearms Pack
description: Add three versatile handguns to your hunting arsenal with the Assorted Sidearms Pack.

name: The Legend of Heroes: Trails from Zero - Deluxe Edition
description: The Deluxe Edition includes Base Game, Digital Soundtrack and Mini Art Book.

name: New Super Mario Bros. Versus: Steve's Map Pack
description: A mod containing verious custom made maps for New Super Mario Bros. Multiplayer.

name: AQRA Tenses: Learn English
description: Are you having trouble with English tenses? This game is specially designed to improve your memory in a short time.

name: Score Gun
description: Sin descripción

name: Lakitu's Great Adventure 2
description: A year after the events of Lakitu’s Great Adventure, Nidoking awakens, fiercer, stronger and more evil than ever. He begins to spread terror throughout the world because he wants to conquer it, but to do so, he must defeat Lakitu once and for all, ordering his soldiers, old and new, to find Lakitu and kill him. As soon as the news arrives, Lakitu is immediately alarmed and will venture into this new world, full of never-before-seen biomes, containing 12 long levels. It is up to Lakitu, along with Yoshi, to stop Nidoking, this time forever! This hack contains 12 long and not too easy levels.

name: Assassin's Creed Valhalla: Tombs of the Fallen Pack 2
description:
This free title update (1.6.1) expands on the Tombs of the Fallen that were introduced in update 1.4.0.

The journey of Tombs of the Fallen comes to an epic conclusion in this all-new addition. Find your way through three mysterious tombs rigged with ancient traps and complex puzzles. Only the most dedicated adventurers will discover buried secrets from a fallen civilization.

Observe and explore deep waters, molten lava, and Isu teachings to solve ancient puzzles and acquire lost treasures.

name: Autumn Spirit
description: Hunted by anxiety, you exiled yourself to a lonely mountain inhabited by a ghost and his regrets.

name: Crypt
description: This is not a video game. This is a psychological torture device. Do not attempt to play this game. You won't have an enjoyable experience. And that's intentional.

name: Parlor
description: Parlor is an interactive party game that can be played with your Twitch chat! Each round you give clues to your chat and they try to guess the answer by typing it to your chat, competing with each other.

name: Capsule Rush
description: Capsule Rush is a third-person 3D platformer game set in different environments. You spawn in on a platform, along the journey you'll have to traverse through many obstacles in order to reach the finish line. Compete against others for the fastest time and buckle up for the challenges waiting ahead!

name: Lost Fleet
description: Lost Fleet is a co-op space shooter. Every ship in your fleet is flyable, from the smallest fighter to the largest battleship. Protect the Mothership, mine resources, crush your enemies.

name: One Hell of a Ride
description: Action-packed, arcade and explosive racing game!

name: Ubaste
description: Ubaste is a 3D platform jumping game, maneuver your cute cat to the finish line!

name: Save the Princess
description: Oh no, The princess has been kidnapped! Help our valiant Knight rescue the princess from the clutches of the demons in this enjoyable, but challenging, platformer game. Defeat your enemies using different weapons, and ultimately Save the Princess.

name: Don't Shit on My #!$@& Roof
description: Don't Shit On My Fucking Roof is a roguelite survival with an extremely simple gameplay. Move and aim, you don't even have to shoot! Choose a starting deity, gain experience and build your equipment. For you and your home. And yes, it looks like the game with vampires there... Or the one with lovecraftian monsters, or the one with living gun bullets, or the game with the crying baby... but well, here, we shoot pigeons.

name: Party Friends
description: Play minigames like Parkour, Prophunt, Fall Tower or other games with up to 16 players. And way more to come!

name: Ultimate Protector
description: Tired of moving around without purposes? Come and protect the goddess with multiple combination of skills and elements. Discover and upgrade your weapon to super, even hyper! Play this game with a joy from both tower defense and rogue!

name: Bloom: Roots of Renewal
description: Bloom: Roots of Renewal is a first person shooter inspired by Hexen and Quake. Use your skills of magic and maneuverability to quell the overgrowth and free the forest and lost village of these creatures.

name: Life Is Strange: Arcadia Bay Collection
description: Rewind time with Max Caulfield and uncover the secrets of Arcadia Bay alongside Chloe Price. Meet an unforgettable cast of characters across two gripping stories.

name: Flippin Misfits
description: Meet the Flippin Misfits. Their arena? A tricked-out, stolen starship. Their gravity-swapping backpacks? Also stolen. Allegedly. Their game? An absolutely bonkers 360° melee brawler, where 2-4 players can throw down, every surface is in play, and up becomes down with the push of a button.

name: Our Mountain
description: Charles, A man who lives peacefully in the countryside. One day he has a serious problem and has to return back to the city that is located on the other side of the valley.

name: Farming Simulator 22: Pumps n' Hoses Pack
description:
Pump it up and upgrade your farming operation with umbilical systems, manure separation and configurable biogas plants! A huge variety of new machines, tools and buildings extend the infrastructure of manure distribution and resource storage on your farm.

Overall, more than 30 items from Dutch manufacturer Schouten, German steel storage specialist Stallkamp and biogas technology manufacturer BVL are included to introduce new gameplay features to Farming Simulator 22.

name: FIFA 23: Ultimate Edition
description: Kick off your season with a boost! FIFA 23 Ultimate Edition includes Xbox One & Xbox Series X|S games plus 4600 FIFA Points.

name: Make Love Not War
description: 12 charming girls will help you relax and have fun. Girl soldiers, doctors, sailors, pilots and special agents are waiting for you!

name: Hearts of Iron IV: By Blood Alone
description: Build a new empire, resist foreign aggression or explore the limits of neutrality in Hearts of Iron IV: By Blood Alone. This new expansion for Paradox Interactive’s World War II grand strategy wargame adds new alternate history options and gameplay variety for three nations, as well as other significant changes.

name: Desta: The Memories Between
description: Desta: The Memories Between is a character-driven rogue-like, featuring an immersive story, strategic turn-based tactics and… a metaphorical ball-game?

name: Dome Keeper
description: Dome Romantik has grown to become Dome Keeper with beautiful updated pixel art, atmospheric music and sound and more of everything. Defend your dome from wave after wave of hostile attacks in this roguelike survival miner. Use the time between each attack to dig beneath the surface in search of valuable resources. Use them carefully on powerful upgrades to help you stay alive and make it to the next world.

name: Green Wounds
description: Craft, manage resources, fight enemies, and explore the unknown in this medieval RPG.

name: Moonscars
description: Push the limits of your combat skills, and master new abilities to progress through an unforgiving nonlinear 2D world. Face off against the relentless darkness that seeks to destroy you. In Moonscars, every death is a lesson learnt—and as you overcome each challenge, new truths will be revealed.

name: Life in Willowdale: Farm Adventures
description:
Welcome to Willowdale, your life of farming and adventure starts here!
The once thriving town of Willowdale is in ruins! The mayor’s business minded daughter Penny has seized the opportunity to transport this once pleasant place into a high-flying modern tourist destination. She doesn’t really like animals and thinks keeping livestock is dirty especially when you can import all these products easily from a nearby town. With humans and nature so out of balance… some of the animals felt abandoned and have already left. Is it too late to stop the changes set in motion by her?

Your uncle, mayor Moneybags calls for your help. Return to your family’s farm to help restore harmony between the people and nature! It is time to light the way for the lost people of the town by reigniting their passion and helping them appreciate the beauty of Willowdale!

name: Kredolis
description: The fall of Atlantis has left a small island unsunken and a mysterious institute has taken hold. You have shipwrecked and found yourself lost between esoteric and mystical puzzles. Find your way home or enter the sunken lighthouse into the depths of Atlantis.

name: Title_Pending
description: Title_Pending is a story based choose your own adventure game. Become a playtester and explore the liminal spaces of an old apartment building to unravel the mystery behind JMC Gaming Enterprises...

name: The Fridge is Red
description:
The Fridge is Red is an anthology of different first person horror stories. Each episode explores a specific theme and experiments with gameplay ideas.

Liminal spaces, surreal encounters and uncanny strangers. You will see a completely mundane settings spiraling down into distorted psychological terror. Experience the dreadful trip inspired by the retro analogue and PS1-era horrors.

name: Hokko Life
description: Hop off the train and into your new life in the village of Hokko! Take over the old workshop and get creative; use crafted materials and design everything in town! With complete creative freedom, what type of town will you build?

name: The Handler of Dragons
description: In the RPG game The Handler of Dragons you play as a warrior who can speak to the dragons. How did it happen? What will be the consequences? Are you going to protect dragons at all costs? How far will you go to obtain their power? The adventure begins...

name: Grounded
description: The world is a vast, beautiful and dangerous place – especially when you have been shrunk to the size of an ant. Explore, build and survive together in this first person, multiplayer, survival-adventure. Can you thrive alongside the hordes of giant insects, fighting to survive the perils of the backyard?

name: The Legend of Heroes: Trails from Zero
description: The Legend of Heroes: Trails from Zero is the fourth installment in the main Trails series, serving as a direct sequel to the events of the Liberl arc and the beginning to the Crossbell arc. The game follows Lloyd Bannings and his colleagues Elie MacDowell, Randy Orlando, and Tio Plato. The four form the Special Support Section, a newly formed department of the Crossbell police in a city-state located between two great powers fighting for control over it.

name: Children of the Flower
description: You are Daisy — spunky, ambitious, and totally fed up with your town's local cult and their "deity": a giant sunflower. Under the gaze of your powerful father, a gang of anarchists send you on a secret mission with an unspeakable objective... to exterminate the Godflower.

name: Card Master
description: Sin descripción

name: 100% Orange Juice: Watty & Pomeranius Character Pack
description: This Extra Character Pack for 100% Orange Juice adds 2 new playable characters from developer Orange_Juice - mermaid Watty and talking dog Pomeranius, as well as character and announcer voices for them!

name: Baphomet's Satellite
description: Baphomet's Satellite (Important: play with complevel 11) is an adventure map in outer space. You'll have to explore and traverse some kind of space station built entirely from Hell's corrupted reality! Manage your ammo carefully and explore as much as you can. You can always turn around and look for supplies before engaging with the demons.

name: Don't Die Alone
description: After receiving an unremarkable spam message, an outcasted teen's friend count becomes the difference between life or death.

name: Lambda-Strike
description: This mod was originally just a reskin of Doom, but now is a full port of all the arsenal of counter-strike 1.6 with some extra.

name: Slapdash
description:
Slapdash is a first-person parkour game about delivering packages and free-running across rooftops in a minimalist city.

This project was made in Unity. Assets were created using Maya, Substance Designer & Painter. Other assets were used in Unity's asset store, including foliage and background buildings.

Slapdash is a simple and relaxing parkour game, which further developed into a short game to showcase at PAX 2022 for the Interactive Media class at Lake Washington Institute of Technology.

name: Metarun
description:
Metarun is the world’s first free-to-play & play-to-earn multiplayer mobile runner game. Built on Unreal Engine 5 and powered by the BNB chain.

Dive into the mysterious world of Danvig, where the circle of time restarts again and again.

name: Kid Monkey: Banana Frenzy
description:
When all his bananas were nabbed by a horde of fruit-stealing critters, Kid Monkey goes on a perilous quest to get back what's his, and then some!

Spit out seeds to grow your own platforms and jump pads. Grab the Big Banana, and collect as many small ones as you can along the way. A dozen carefully crafted levels will test the extent of your platforming skills.

But before you jump in, ask yourself this simple question:

Are you monkey enough to go on this Banana Frenzy?

name: Strand Boy
description: A demake of Death Stranding for the Game Boy.

name: My Agent is a Futanari
description: An aspiring actor down on his luck, you visit your casting agent in person to implore her for work--"anything".

name: SpongeBob: Get Cooking
description:
Play as SpongeBob to create your own Bikini Bottom kitchen, decorate and customize your restaurant, and get ready to serve your guests delicious food! In this fast-food cooking game, put your time-management skills to the test and experience an expanded SpongeBob universe.

Available exclusively for Netflix members.

name: My Girlfriend Loves My Blood
description: When a beautiful new girl transfers to your school, it falls to you to give her a tour. Things seem to be going well… until you cut your hand. Now you're being chased by powerful vampires from the Underworld who want your special blood, and your only respite is a group of vampire sisters who swear to use your powers for good!

name: Infinimine
description: A mining Experience for all to discover and work together.

name: Hobby Simulator Bundle
description: A bundle of Rover Mechanic Simulator, Train Station Renovation, and Car Mechanic Simulator Classic

name: Farm & Survive Bundle
description: A bundle of Mr. Prepper and Farm Manager 2022.

name: World of Outlaws: Dirt Racing - Gold Edition
description: The Greatest Show on Dirt makes its video game return!

name: Reflex Runner
description: Reflex Runner is a speed running platformer that increases in difficulty as you progress through close to 40 unique levels. clear each level as fast as possible dodging razor sharp saw blades, red hot lasers, shooting flames and more as you race to set world record clear times!

name: ChocuPixel
description: ChocuPixel is a two dimensional platformer starring the beloved character chocu. In this adventure we must find chocus friend Juan who is lost in the basement, but we will have to fight many enemies to get to him.

name: Fantasteroids
description: Fast-paced gameplay, rainbow colours and snappy animations all come together to give you a retro arcade-feel game with renewed graphics and avatars. There's a variety of different modes for you to choose from, and different skins to unlock and leaderboards for you to show off to your friends!

name: Stroke the Hedgehog
description:
Hedgehogs are cute, that is for sure, but they are also a little spikey.

We all want to stroke one, but in reality it will leave you feeling a little damaged, here though, their spikes are nice and soft, well not really, they will still hurt.

At least you can deal with the not so real pain though.

Get stroking!

name: The Chaput's Baby
description: The Chaput church was a well know place by the neighbors. Year gave way to year and the small church now is only the place where the Chaput family lives. Samantha is hired by the family to look after their baby, but things starts to go off inside the house.

name: Planet Barren Objective
description: Fight, upgrade, explore and build your way out off this dangerous planet in this 2D, pixel art side scroller. Stream of foes will keep you on your toes while beating them will reward you with much needed resources.

name: Blocks of Nature
description: Combine cubes of the same color in a lapland-inspired scene with bright visuals and relaxing music for casual gameplay

name: World of Outlaws: Dirt Racing
description:
Start as a local track racer and work your way up the ranks to become the next World of Outlaws champion. Upgrade your car, team, and facilities to stay competitive with the best of the best.

Race in both the premier World of Outlaws Sprint Car and Late Model Series, as well as 4 additional DIRTcar classes across more than 40 tracks.

Race at iconic real-world venues like Eldora, Volusia, Williams Grove, and more! World of Outlaws: Dirt Racing features 14 officially licensed tracks and many others inspired by real world venues!

name: Alice in Wonderland: Jigsaw Puzzle
description: Relive Alice's adventures in Wonderland with this beautifully illustrated jigsaw puzzle game. Eight puzzles from easy to not-so-easy difficulty level, with cards and trophies! Just use the mouse to drag and drop the jigsaw pieces onto the right place.

name: Go! Go! Kokopolo Anniversary Collection
description: Get ready to return to the world's first Chase'em Up - in an all new sequel Go! Go! Kokopolo. Set across 80 brand new stages of pure arcade mayhem, help the hyperactive wildcat, kokopolo, and his insane buddies, track down a secret recipe for immortality by causing as much mischief as possible in this epic, action-packed caper.

name: World of Warcraft: Wrath of the Lich King Classic
description: The Lich King's forces await you in the icy continent of Northrend. World of Warcraft: Wrath of the Lich King Classic is coming, and with it another chance to relive the legend and face one of Azeroth's greatest villains.

name: The Matriarch
description: An online party game where only 1 player is not an Imposter. Play as a Nun and emulate the bot behavior to avoid raising suspicions. Play as the Matriarch and identify all the player-controlled nuns before one of them escapes the Satanic convent!

name: Outcore: Desktop Adventure
description: All you wanted was a nice game. But now you find yourself opening Windows apps like Paint & Notepad to solve puzzles, and searching for files on your computers that you didn't put there... Who is she? Why did she appear on your desktop? Let's dive into her memories and find out.

name: The Spirit and the Mouse
description: Bring kindness and light to the people of Sainte-et-Claire as Lila - a tiny mouse with a big heart! Explore a quaint French village, make electrifying new friends, and do good deeds for those in need in this lush narrative adventure game.

name: Terra Invicta
description: From the creators of Long War, an alien invasion has fractured humanity into seven ideological factions each with a unique vision for the future. Lead your chosen faction to take control of Earth's nations, expand across the Solar System, and battle enemy fleets in tactical combat.

name: Black Witchcraft
description: Lady Ligeia, the legendary and magnificent witch, welcome to the House of Usher. Roderick Usher is scheming to resurrect the wicked witch Lenore. We are in dire need of your great Machina magic. Please save us.

name: Saturday Night is the Loneliest Night of the Week II
description: After being sucked unwillingly into a vortex Jilly's adventure continues! Dropped unceremoniously onto an alien planet she makes her escape into the unknown. Who knows, maybe you'll make a new friend! A short point-and-click adventure game with EGA graphics with over 500 frames of animation. That's, like, maybe a minute! Made in two weeks for the $106 Adventure Game Challenge.

name: ZJ the Ball Calculator
description: A game in the "ZJ the Ball" series!

name: Dirt Journey: Nitro
description: Join this Dirt Journey thorough the dirst racing in the pimped car with nitro. Enjoy the graphics with the best tunes.

name: My Sugar Mommy is a Futanari
description: In desperate need for extra cash, you take to the internet and come across a Sugar Mommy website.

name: There Won't be Light
description: Escape the terror lurking in the darkness in this immersive co-op experience. Solve challenges and work as a team using your main tool: your voice. Beware of lurking monsters, which might be the ones you least expect.

name: Solitarius
description: Solitarius is a 2D top-down wave shooter set in a sci-fi space environment.

name: Pokemon Fused Dimensions
description: Pokemon Fused Dimensions is a GBA ROM Hack by DanteZ.35 based on Pokemon Fire Red. And it is now available to download. It was last updated on September 24, 2022.

name: On Wasteland
description: Sin descripción

name: Run and Gun
description: Run and Gun is an action roguelike shooting game where you mow down thousands of enemies while unlocking newer and deadlier weapons. The enemies won't stop spawning, and your guns won't stop firing. Earn gold each run to unlock permanent upgrades to make your next run deadlier.

name: WannaFest 22
description:
After the events of I Wanna Be The Guy, The Kid is invited to a game show hosted by an imposing figure! Fight your way through several game challenges to compete for a high score. Do you have what it takes to master these games and win the grand prize?

Developed by Cherry Treehouse for Fangame Marathon 2022's Blind Adventure event, WannaFest 22 is a fast-paced rollercoaster through hidden gaming gems of the past!

name: The Book of Warriors
description: The Book of the Warriors is a retro SLG+ roguelike game. As a fan of SLG, have you been looking for a kind of war chess that can build a variety of fancy Bulid? Start the game! You will find the charm of SLG~

name: Beat of the Pixel Heat
description: Beat of The Pixel Heat is a rhythm game in which you must control HEAT, an artificial intelligence responsible for defending cyberspace from a wave of viral elements that have invaded your home!

name: Where Did the Humans Go?
description: A pilot descends on a planet where something strange is going on. When he arrives at a scientist's camp, there's no trace of humans. Only robots are left and their behaviour is strange. Where did the humans go?

name: Toem: Basto Region
description: Basto is Toem's biggest region filled with brand new content like treasure hunting, minigames, and spooky stories.

name: Piratepoly Gold: Caribbean Treasure
description: Ahoy Pirates! The time has come for an incredible journey. Together with the entire crew, we must conquer the whole Caribbean Sea, which is filled with valuable gold. Be vigilant because hostile units and various dangers await us on every corner.

name: The Jumping Churros: Turbo
description: Join Big C on his exciting journey through the kitchen and make him jump! Enjoy the colorful comic graphics accompanied by atmospheric music.

name: The Baseball T
description: Throw the ball to become the best baseball player in the world.

name: Convenient
description: You pull over to the nearest convenience store on your way home to get gas and quickly realize the rumors were true about this place. Survive and escape the Oldlake Stalker.

name: Hardrock Sex 3D
description: Hardrock Sex 3D is a visual novel game with 3D animated sex scenes. Meet our characters, discover their story and explore all the hot scenes they are to offer.

name: Watamari: A Match Made in Heaven Part1
description: Hoshino HIkari is a female spy who joins an all girls school as a student to discover its secrets with no intention to stand out… when she suddenly receives the Mark of Virgo, and timeslips 1 year in the past?! By the developers of Ne no Kami: The Two Princess Knights of Kyoto.

name: Hexceed: Novus Pack
description: This DLC unlocks a brand new world for hexceed: Nouvs Puzzle your way through 200 new levels with a new mechanic!

name: Thatcher's Techbase: Arcade Edition
description: An arcade version of Thatcher's Techbase created for the Living Rent organisation, debuting at Liverpool's The World Transformed Festival in 2022. This new version of Thatcher's Techbase runs on arcade hardware and has redesigned gameplay, along with a new storyline, fast-paced maps and a scoring system.

name: Han'yo
description: After witnessing her village being destroyed and slaughtered by the Oni demon, Hiroko has only one goal: revenge. Join this young samurai in this 2D side-scrolling platformer.

name: Cyberhunk
description: Retro FPS wave shooter with stackable powerups and upgradeable weapons.

name: Regular Human Workshop
description: Regular Human Workshop is a 2D physics simulation sandbox. There are no predefined goals or objectives. Simply throw objects into the world and interact with them in various ways.

name: Tower of Ardia
description: With her sister's health in decline, Rayla searches for a legendary magic called Ardia. Her search brings her to a foreboding tower where it is said this power resides.

name: GroundFall
description: Groundfall is a first-person, bush flying, survival game in an open world wilderness setting! You are a park ranger flying various aerial patrol missions on a series of islands located off the southwest coast of Alaska.

name: Honey Magician
description: Have you ever been attracted to a sexy, mysterious beauty magician? This game will let you enjoy and participate in the beautiful magician's performance.

name: Mystery Box: Escape The Room
description: Welcome to the 3rd chapter of the "Mystery Box" series. You're trapped inside dark rooms and must solve intriguing enigmas to open boxes and escape. Can you make it?

name: The King of Cats
description: Navigate the claustrophobic corridors of a cargo ship and try to survive a night with man-eating tigers on the loose. Your choices will determine who lives and who dies.

name: Broken Through
description:
7 years ago, your best friend Leo Williams mysteriously disappeared, and no one had the slightest clue where he went.

Seven years after this incident, Leo was declared dead since no one could find him.

And now you are in possession of his belongings.

But something about his stuff seems off...

Something says he's still out there.

And many more too.

Broken Through is a full length psychological story rich horror game experience that blends terrifying scenarios with dreamish visuals combined with a nostalgic retro theme.

Wander through this world with caution at all time.

There’s more than what meets the eye.

name: Hazel
description: Sin descripción

name: Parking Master Multiplayer 2
description: Finally, Parking Master Multiplayer 2 is here! All in one: Multiplayer, open-world, next-gen graphics and real car parking experience.

name: Bobo the Cat
description: The neighbours are often annoyed by naughty cat Bobo. One day they decide to get rid of him. Little Bobo wakes up far away and all alone. Will he find a way back home?

name: Planet Crossword
description: The collaborative crossword game made for streaming and video conferencing

name: Maskonauts: Chat'Attack
description:
Shoot and loot the content of your favorite Twitch channels!
Get in your Maskopod and play in real time with Twitch chats activities! Survive waves of texts, Emoticodes and enemies.
Collect bonuses and try to defeat the Blockbossters and save the Maskotios!

Everything you type in the chat appears in the game!

name: Cyber Protocol: Retro Arcade
description: Find your way around demanding challenges, traps and mechanics. They may be easy to grasp but they're very hard to master. Find a way to gather all of the coins and become the best hacker.

name: Taiko no Tatsujin: Rhythm Festival - Deluxe Edition
description:
Includes:
- Main Game
- 90-Day Taiko Music Pass (single-use non-auto-renew)

name: Family Chess: Special Edition
description:
Pick your favorite Choose one of the heros and challenge other players in this family-friendly version of Chess. Thanks to the cartoony graphics, this variation can be enyojed by people of all ages.

If you want to improve on your own, try out one of five difficulty options and play with an NPC. Find your favorite opening and improve with every game. If you are looking for a real challenge try out the expert mode.

name: Late Night Mop
description: Late Night Mop is a haunted house cleaning simulator.

name: Cursor0x0
description: Cursor0x0 is a collection of various cursor mini games that require a good reaction, stamina, and precision. Fight enemies, win races, dodge bullets, complete different goals to unlock new challenge types and reach the final level!

name: Match 3 Bundle of 3
description: Match 3 games for everyone!

name: The Bombs Have Been Dropped, I am Listening to Steely Dan and Wearing Cheap Sunglasses.
description: A visual novel about talking to cute girls during the nuclear holocaust.

name: Folds of a Separation
description: Folds of a Separation is a short rumination on a state's control over bodies and the grief that stems from carceral violence.

name: Feather Park
description: Explore an autumn park and play minigames. Make friends and enter the barn.

name: Dragon Run Classic
description: Dragon Run Classic is a Runner style arcade game where the user leaps and dashes through obstacles to get to the finish line. Play and survive through 12 levels of as you complete your epic run as a dragon.

name: Cross the Ages: Trading Card Game
description:
Cross the Ages: TCG is a fast competitive trading card NFT game where players compete in strategic duels to capture more space than their opponent on the game board.

The game is designed in a “blitz” format. Each player only has five minutes to play their turns. Making Cross The Ages an addictive experience in which players have to both “Play Fast” and “Play Smart” in order to win.

Players collect cards from a collection of +350 characters through chest rewards, daily quests, special events like e-sports competitions. These cards can be upgraded and merged into more powerful versions: alternative and alternative combo cards.

In addition, players can reach for web3 features like the Immutable X marketplace to trade their assets freely: buy and sell cards or even borrow and lend them to other players. They can hold CTA tokens to access additional rewards. By completing the entire collection of CTA, they will also be able to bring their digital cards to physical, by turning their NFT into NFC: Nun-Fungible Cards.

name: Scribbleman Army
description: Scribbleman Army is a colony management game where you have to explore a cave.

name: Samurai Pussy
description: What could be more beautiful than hentai?

name: Weird Japan
description: Weird Japan is a role-playing game in which the main character returns from the war with the Crusaders.During the war, the world has changed and he will have to take one of the sides.Explore a fantasy alternative medieval Japan.

name: Gravity Box
description: Gravity Box is a retro-styled score attack game that requires the player to frantically swap gravity in order to avoid hazards. Grab the gems, unlock cool costumes, and see how long you can last!

name: Dirt Journey
description: Sin descripción

name: The Pizza Courier
description: Our mission is to make people happy, eating the best pizza in town, as it is taken out of the oven. Do you think you are ready for such challenges?

name: Vilomah
description: Play as Jake, a teen Pizza Delivery driver on the late shift - until things get BLOODY! Try to escape this DEMENTED Farm with your life! Features PS1, 80's VHS Graphics.

name: Cataire: Gambling with cats
description: Cat + Solitaire = Cataire (legal gambling with cats). Purrfection graphic, You can playing CATAIRE with mouse, meow sounds and purrfect music. Cats would buy CATAIRE (if they could play). Buy it right meow!

name: The Imaginary Circle
description: The Imaginary Circle is a narrative experience, lasting about an hour and a half, in which you must find your way around an abandoned prison. Rummage through the documents, force open doors, call former employees, craft tools, but overall ask yourself: Should I use my only bullet now?

name: Tiny Rogues
description: Tiny Rogues is a fantasy rogue-lite bullet-hell dungeon crawler with rpg elements. Build a new unique character each run and fight one monster-infested room after another! Discover unique weapons, collect magical items and level up to become more and more powerful!

name: Alien War
description: In 2222 AD, only 5% of humanity survived the alien invasion. The aliens have begun their final attack. Defeat the aliens by firing the guns of the KPO9, humanity’s strongest surface-to-air weapon.

name: Paramnesia
description: Paramnesia is an interactive detective visual novel where Maria, the protagonist of this story, is a member of two radical sects with contradictory opinions. Trying to understand herself, she is walking on thin ice, and only you will know the truth after delving into the depths of her mind.

name: The Shadelight
description: Shadelight is a horror game set in Louisiana. Hide and sneak to avoid mutant family. Find nesesary items to leave their mansion.

name: Versus.
description: Versus. is a turn-based multiplayer shooter made in the Unreal Engine 5 aspects. Play in a 1 vs 1 or a 2 vs 2 with or against your friends! Try to survive and be the best at the end!

name: Golfing In Aether
description: Multiplayer minigolf designed around a procedural course layout allowing you to experience something different everytime you play. Support for both online play and four player split screen.

name: Lord of the Click 3
description: The Orcs are getting closer and very soon they will get so close that it will be impossible to get out of the elf kingdom. For the good of the people, the king himself is ready to stop the army of monsters. It will be difficult to determine how this battle will end if you don't help him!

name: Remoteness
description: New York, 2034: back home from a crazy party at the pub, you wake up late and immediately understand that something is wrong. The district you live in has been evacuated and isolated overnight by the army, after an electrical meteor shower hit the Earth!

name: Pillars of Sorrow
description: Pillars of Sorrow is a top down twinstick shooter, where you fight your inner demons while trying to regain your former self. After something vile happened you will be fighting tormenting thoughts, emptyness and Apathy as a lost soul. Will you be able to free your mind again?

name: Desktop Goose
description: Sin descripción

name: Rumble
description: You're a beginning martial artist with the power to control stone. By striking poses inspired by real-life fighting sports, you can create attacks out of the earth beneath your feet. Test your skills and creativity in the online PVP arena!

name: Tales of Tomorrow: Experiment
description: ToT: Experiment is a sci-fi short story game set on a remote ship wandering through space. Without any memories or recollection of his past our hero is tasked by the ship AI - EVE to perform daily tasks, that will help to maintain the ship.

name: Shovel Knight Dig
description: When Drill Knight and his dastardly digging crew blast apart Shovel Knight’s peaceful campsite and steal his loot, he grabs his trusty Shovel Blade and starts tunnelling after them! Meet new friends and foes, visit strange lands, and outfit yourself in your quest to keep the entire land from collapsing underfoot! Jump, slash, and dig your way down an ever-changing chasm of mystery in Shovel Knight Dig, an all-new Shovel Knight adventure!

name: Prodeus
description:
"Prodeus is the first person shooter of old, re-imagined using modern rendering techniques. It reaches the quality you expect from a AAA experience while adhering to some of the aesthetic technical limits of older hardware."

In Prodeus, the players slip into the role of a corrupted agent of Prodeus who is determined on his way to destroy his creator and every opponent.

name: Parahcuy
description: Andi and his friends' adventure in eradicating injustice and bullying in their school environment.

name: Zoop Zoop Bee Adventures 7
description: Defend your meadows from Dick Dastardly Duck! Drop-in multiplayer with up to four bees! yurm, pollin~

name: Dyschronia: Chronos Alternate - Episode I: False Awakening
description:
The first episode of Dyschronia: Chronos Alternate, a sci-fi investigation VR game that continues the Chronos Universe series by developer MyDearest.

In Episode I, you play as Special Supervisor Hal Scion, tasked with unraveling the mystery threatening to plunge the city into disaster. As a "variant human" who has the unique ability to both see into and alter the past, your unique skills are exactly what is needed now.

There'll be menacing forces that will test your mental agility. Hide, Run, Sneak and escape from danger as you gather evidence. Then accuse the perpetrators in exciting courtroom sequences where you must prove their culpability even when they’re fighting you every step of the way.

name: Little Cities: Attractions Update
description: Excite your citizens with Attractions – an all-new collection of dozens of delightful items to transform your city, putting everything from billboards to beach huts at your fingertips. Innovative placements will up your Style Rating, adding a fresh layer of depth for our most creative builders.

name: Hunt: Showdown - The Penitent
description:
This DLC contains one Legendary Hunter, two Legendary weapons, and one Legendary consumable:

- The Penitent (one Hunter)
- Delirium (one weapon)
- The Scourge (one weapon)
- False Sacrament (Regeneration Shot)

name: The Descent of the Serpent
description: Go back in time to ancient Mesoamerica and help save the world!

name: Valis: The Fantasm Soldier Collection II
description:
Your adventure with Yuko is not over yet!
The legendary bishojo action game series is back with its 2nd collection!

name: Gas Station Simulator: Party Time
description: The party is about to start with new content in this free DLC. Collectables, popularity boosts and ice cream to get everyone excited!

name: Counter Crossline: Crime War
description: A single-player top down game that fights against terrorists around the world! The suspenseful stages in various places! Weapons that excite military fans!

name: Femboy Bangers 2
description: A late night drive around town in search of pizza has you stumbling upon a new establishment.

name: Real Truck Simulator 2022
description: Become an American truck driver and show your driver skills. Choose cargo and drive it. Transport cargo to city warehouses. Feel what is American road.

name: Hard Platformers Pack: Super Cyborg and Dead Dungeon
description:
Super Cyborg

Super Cyborg is an old school non-stop hardcore run'n'gun action game! You are an elite battle cyborg who is sent in to investigate a series of anomalies on a mysterious island.

Dead Dungeon

Dead Dungeon is a hardcore 2D platformer in the best traditions of classic games, with an excellent chiptune soundtrack. The game will check your nerves for strength and bring a lot of emotions.

name: Maze of Realities: Reflection of Light - Collector's Edition
description: Where's the borderland of light and darkness? A meteorite crashes in Arizona and creates a portal to the parallel universe. Will you dare to explore foreign lands?

name: Stroke the Hamster
description:
It is small, it is cute and it is ready to be stroked. Get your own little hamster right there in your living room.

You get unlimited strokes on the little guy who will be enjoying every single one of them, so don't be afraid to keep on stroking.

Relax with your very own hamster.

name: Pizza Fun
description: Pizza Fun is a retro rhythm game that lets the user complete a level with the controller buttons. Try to complete the level with your best time. Trophies are collected as you complete the rhythm goals. Single player fun and arcade style entertainment.

name: Potion Permit: Deluxe Edition
description: Moonbury's residents need healing, and you're the best chemist around! With your trusty tools, a brewing cauldron, and a canine companion at your side, you'll need to diagnose symptoms, gather ingredients, brew potions, and cure ailments in this open-ended sim RPG.

name: Session: Skate Sim - Deluxe Edition
description: The team has kept some surprises for the release: experience Péitruss, the largest skatepark in Europe; the Hangar, a new training area; and a load of cool gear - a prisoner outfit, two exclusive grip tapes and two decks!

name: The Jumping Churros
description: Join Big C on his exciting journey through the kitchen and make him jump! Enjoy the colorful comic graphics accompanied by atmospheric music.

name: Operation Wolf Returns: First Mission - D1 Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Arcane Arts Academy 2
description: Return to the world of magic for another academic year!

name: Oxu
description: Minimalistic 3d puzzle with portals, cubes and lasers.

name: Super Pentagon
description: Super Pentagon revolves around a unique rhythm game concept, challenging vision, focus and beat skills alike!

name: Songs from the Iron Sea
description: Immerse yourself in a contrasted emotional journey with delicate visuals! Songs from the Iron Sea is a poetic platformer set in a whimsical aquatic universe. Guided by a kind entity, embody a creature lost in a metal nightmare and escape the foreman's gaze to regain your freedom.

name: Winged Raider
description: Save the Kingdom of Daanco from the curse of Turkzu in Winged Raider! Unlock the story by progressing in this goofy roguelike 2D shooter. Fly around the Winged Castle, find new weapons, unlock abilities with colored wings, kill your enemies, and DIE?! Try not to die.

name: Your Waifu Juice
description: Fight with the dungeon dwellers and enjoy sex scenes with lovely girls! You have to consistently conquer 5 dungeons of varying difficulty. Defeat opponents, fight terrible bosses, get more and more sophisticated weapons.

name: Seeking Asylum: Revelations
description: Seeking Asylum: Revelations is a Single player/ multiplayer Co-Op video game for the PC. It is 100% free to play and you may enjoy it with your friends at any time. Connect through Discord voice chat and shoot zombies with your friends in this story driven Left for Dead style game.

name: Rift Loopers
description: Survive the horrors of the multiverse, alone or with your comrades, as you battle against an onslaught of insectoid like creatures. Combine abilities in different ways each loop to overcome and return safely to your universe.

name: Karate Beasts
description: Karate Beasts is a story based simulated 2D game you have to train your beast in order to be the best and restore your family's pride by beating the villain named Dark Sensei's beast.

name: Red Escape Bundle
description: Sin descripción

name: The Anointed: David Saves Keilah
description: The Anointed: David Saves Keilah is a single player, 3rd person action/adventure game. As David, the player can run, climb, scale walls, swing from ropes and ride a horse on the journey through ancient Judah - using Stealth, Combat and Strategy to fulfill God's plan and save the people of Keilah from the Philistines.

name: Tap the Blocks
description: Tap the blocks is the one-screen time killer puzzle! Gain an enormous score by removing stacks of blocks with the same color. Your smart clicks are the only way to remove blocks before falling into the abyss.

name: Train Life: A Railway Simulator - The Orient-Express Edition
description: The Orient-Express Edition contains the complete Train Life: A Railway Simulator game and the 1920's Orient-Express Train DLC. Take the controls of the Orient-Express train operated by the Compagnie Internationale des Wagons-Lits, only in Train Life!

name: Steel Saviour Reloaded
description: Steel Saviour is back! Try yourself at this revised 16: 9 version of a cult side scrolling shooter.

name: Goo Gladiators
description: Mutate and battle a collection of super cute goos in Goo Gladiators. Grow your team and fight others online in strategic auto-battling arenas. Form 'Goo Gangs' with your friends and rise up the leaderboards to become a 'Goo Master'.

name: 30 Days to be the Best
description: You have a dream... but the clock is ticking. Your determination and your own two fists are all you have left. Make them count.

name: Runaway Animals
description: Runaway Animals is a 1-4 player co-op & PvP action-comedy game. A mysterious man with a monkey freeing wild animals in captivity. What could go wrong? Complete your duties at your underpaid job while you cope with these uncontrollable animals in this story-driven adventure.

name: ElvenEscape
description: Help Ann Varissa escape captivity from the demon in this stylized pixel 2D top-down shooting! Remember to keep a safe distance while killing demons with a variety of bows and weapons. Suffer the consequences of defeat with BDSM H-scenes and detailed CGs!

name: DreamWorks Dragons: Legends of the Nine Realms
description: Unleash your inner dragon and fly beyond the Hidden World, on a fiery adventure to rescue Thunder’s family and save the dragon kingdoms!

name: OneShot: World Machine Edition
description:
The World Knows You Exist.

Experience an adventure game with puzzles that go beyond its own window and establish a unique bond with the main character.

In OneShot: World Machine Edition, you discover a strange computer operating system with a self-contained world installed. Explore this world to unravel its mysteries and help guide a child on their mission to restore the long-dead sun.

You hear that saving the world may no longer be possible… But it’s worth a shot, you think. Now with collectible content and features exclusive to the World Machine Edition!

name: Flashout III
description: Flashout is back! Where high speed meets high stakes. Where unforgiving combat, loud electronic music and addictive boosts of adrenaline mix up to separate winners from losers. Where gravitation is nothing more than an empty word. Take part in an exciting, head-to-head fight to the finish!

name: Programmer Dungeon Knightress
description: In this tactical game, use logic programming to solve puzzles and beat each level. Gather unique skills, use visual programming, automate your character and defeat your enemies! Choose wisely and enjoy this adventure!

name: Smooth Operators 2
description: Welcome back to Smooth Operators 2! Smooth Operators is an advanced simulation where you take control of a customer service company and lead it to financial success! Hire employees and customize your buildings with different types of offices, facilities and accessories!

name: The DioField Chronicle
description: The DioField Chronicle is a tale of war and honor. Featuring a unique and beautiful world that blends fantasy, medieval and modern-day influences with a deep yet innovative real-time battle system.

developers.name: Square Enix Creative Business Unit II

name: Taiko no Tatsujin: Rhythm Festival
description: Welcome to Omiko City, the stage for Taiko no Tatsujin: Rhythm Festival! A city full of everyone’s favorite Taiko elements is gathered into one town! Together with DON-chan, meet your new friend, Kumo-kyun and aim to become a Taiko Master!

name: Bard Idle
description: Build a unique team, where each character has a random weapon, race and class. Strong combinations of heroes, enhanced by the ballad creation system and jelly dwarfs, will capture your adventure in history!

name: Dyschronia: Chronos Alternate
description: Become Hal, an inspector with the ability to manipulate the past. Your mission is to solve a crime in the city where no crime is possible. Investigate in the real world and the dream world. Solve the mysteries that the citizens and places hide and survive the threats that will try to stop you. You're the only one able to reveal the truth and avoid the foresight of the destruction of the city after 7 days to become true!

name: Empire Chronicles
description: Turn Based Strategy RPG. With complex skills, sprawling world and detailed storyline.

name: Potion Permit
description: Moonbury's residents need healing, and you're the best chemist around! With your trusty tools, a brewing cauldron, and a canine companion at your side, you'll need to diagnose symptoms, gather ingredients, brew potions, and cure ailments in this open-ended sim RPG.

name: Slime Rancher 2
description: Continue the adventures of Beatrix LeBeau as she journeys across the Slime Sea to Rainbow Island, a land brimming with ancient mysteries, and bursting with wiggly, new slimes to wrangle in this sequel to the smash-hit, Slime Rancher.

name: Slayer Cat
description: Slayer Cat is a classic action shooter game that combines hand-drawn drawings with classic gameplay. Inspired by games like Contra, Doom, and Cuphead. Play as The Slayer Cat as you traverse strange places on an enemy planet, and discover and discover the mysteries of this place!

name: Beacon Pines
description: Beacon Pines is a cute and creepy adventure game within a magical storybook. You play as both the reader of the book and its main character, Luka. Explore the town to find word charms. Use your charms to change the course of fate!

name: SpiderHeck
description:
A physics-based spider murder simulator. Multiple spiders enter only one spider leaves.

Fight through a rapid progression of levels using various deadly weapons and environmental hazards to murder your friends and loved ones.

name: Serial Cleaners
description: Serial Cleaners is a single-player stealth action crime story in which you alternate between playing four eccentric mob cleaners taking on the bloodiest jobs the carefree 1990s had to offer. If you remember the nineties differently, their dirty work is the reason why.

name: Camped Out!
description:
Camped Out is a frenetic couch co-op game for friends and families where up to four players must work together to set up camp before darkness falls.

Work together as a team to complete campsites and unlock further areas in the game world.

Each level is a race against the clock where players are required to build tents, construct a campfire, cook enough food and get into bed before darkness falls.

name: Session: Skate Sim
description: Inspired by the golden era of skateboarding, the early 90s and early 2000, Session's primary goal is to make you experience what skateboarding really is; an incredible sport where there are no other goals other than expressing your creativity and achieving success through hard work, perseverance and bits of madness for no one else other than yourself.

name: No Place For Bravery
description: No Place for Bravery is a 2D top-down action RPG which weaves together exquisite visuals, a stirring soundtrack and intense combat moments into a darkly haunting tale that explores the lengths we’d go to recapture all we hold dear.

name: Comic Coloring Book Complete Edition: Colors +
description: Sin descripción

name: A Husk at Dusk
description:
A Husk At Dusk invites you to step into Stanley the Scarecrow's magical corn maze. You'll be met with puzzles and challenges along the way in this autumn themed adventure. For those who complete Stan's maze there is a ... great reward waiting.

This is Lump Hammer Games' first release and we hope you enjoy playing it as much as we enjoyed making it! We dedicate this game to the memory of Stanley Bell (1948-2011) who loved video games, corny jokes and a good maze.

name: Moémon: Heart of Gold
description: Moémon: Heart of Gold is a ROM hack based on the Heart Gold Version. What sets it apart from the original is the concept design.

name: Petdise Tycoon
description:
Petdise - A one-stop service center; a paradise for pets!
Can you successfully run your own pet center?

This is a casual, easy game. By making strategic decisions, you will successfully manage a pet center and achieve profitable results. Start with an ordinary pet grooming salon to build the best pet service empire!

name: Jam Above Jam Below
description: Witz and Doobz on their adventure to make a video game through seven different mini-games and funny cartoon cutscenes!

name: Cute Chaos Demon Nyanbaba
description:
The super cute villain Nyanbaba is back again! This time, meow bully invaded 10 new scenes, found all the strange hidden points and cracked the magic of cat ear Nyanbaba!
Contains jump out shock (cute)! And super cute Chinese dubbing! More scenes, more voice, more joy!

name: Fated Demon Lovers
description:
Life as a high school student is boring. Fortunately, your best friend is there to share the exciting fantasy stories she writes. You always seem to gravitate toward the villains though. So much, in fact, that it inspires her to write you into her next novel as one. But it’s only a story… right?

Next thing you know, you’re thrown into a fictional world where three handsome men all fawn over you. Everything seems great, until it soon becomes clear that you've somehow become their demon princess, and the three are now counting on you to follow through on their plot to kill the human king!

name: Eldrum: Red Tide
description:
Red Tide is a dark fantasy story about a former soldier who is searching for his family in a world ravaged by war.

Your brother is gone without a trace. What happened to him? The answer to this question lies at the end of a long and dangerous journey.

The world has changed. The place where you were born was burned to ash. People out there are struggling to survive.

You are a shadow of your former self, having suffered grave injuries during the war. But the past is the past. What matters is the here and now. You have the freedom to shape your own destiny.

There is always a choice.

name: Sex Adventures: The Bar Hookup
description: An explicit erotic visual novel following the story of twenty-three years old Luiza hooking up with her very big and very cocky customer in the bathroom of the empty college bar she’s working at.

name: Arcade Archives: The Return of Ishtar
description: The sequel to "The Tower of Druaga" is finally here!

name: Pyro Complete Bundle
description: Relive three masterpieces, originally developed by the legendary Pyro Studios, that defined the real-time tactics genre like nothing before, re-imagined in full HD.

name: Too Slime and Snake
description:
Too Slime And Snake - is a puzzle game where you need to reach the star!

Borrow and apply functions to clear the way to the star
Three different characters, 14 types of cells, 100 levels are waiting for you

name: Siege Worlds
description:
Join up to 4 players and fight as a team to prevent an attack by hordes of undead and monsters. Connect your DiviGo wallet to earn Divi rewards, can you make it to the end of the wave alive?

Battle as historical characters, or build your own. With many options to chose from, every squad is unique. Build your character, assemble your squad, and repel the hordes.

name: Pacmaga 2
description: Pacmaga 2 is continuation of successful 2D platformer with main goal ofdefending against waves of enemies and surviving Boss fight!

name: The Cow Quiz
description: Do you want to learn some amazing facts about the Cows? We have the right game for you The Cow Quiz.

name: Astro
description: A journey going through impossible geometrical worlds. Experience this meditative and calming puzzle game by creating portals and modifing the environment.

name: Archery Simulator
description: Your mission is to became a true professional in this sport. At first you will practice very simple shots to see your real skills. After some practice, all kinds of challenges await you that seem complicated even to some skilled people.

name: Silen House
description: 《silen house》 is a scary adventure puzzle game. There is always a strange cry in the deserted old house in the deep mountains. I don't know where I came from. When I approached the old house, a grim burst came.

name: Dreamer's Road
description: Help make the world a better place while carrying the weight of your studies and 3 jobs on your shoulders! Experience the reality of thousands of young immigrants in the United States, seeking to improve themselves and help the growth of this great nation.

name: Idle University
description:
Manage your study group to make full use of the students’ abilities. Guide your study group through the classroom, recreation, and extracurricular activities. Level up and equip your students to make sure they’re living up to their full academic potential. Complete daily tasks to ensure you’re on track to meet your academic goals.
Explore the campus of Idle University!

name: Hero's Journey
description: Hero's Journey is a 2D platformer where you'll fight goblins and evil potato dudes in order to make a demanding squirrel happy.

name: The Cabin: Summer Vacation | Episode 1
description: When your summer plans take a sharp detour, and you find yourself out in the middle of the wood, you'll soon learn this will be summer you'll never forget. Filled with adventure, love, fear and danger; your choices could be the difference between life and death out here, at The Cabin.

name: V.O.S.S. Turbo
description: VOSS Turbo is a retro styled, on rail, twin stick shooter with controller and keyboard support. Gameplay difficulty will climb as you visit and conquer new worlds. 30 stages to explore, with secrets to uncover, and bosses to whoop. Explore everything the multiverse has to offer!

name: Simple Builder
description: Simple Builder is basically exactly what it's name is a simple building game. You can build a large number of structures and/or large ones and have five save locations to try out. As you build more in each save location your gathering range increases.

name: The First Step
description: Explore 2 levels, and collect all the required items. The levels are timed, so you can try to beat the levels as fast as possible. Or you can casually take your time and explore around. This project is only meant as a learning project for me. So please do not expect a complete game.

name: Cubic Figures
description: Cubic Figures is a minimalistic puzzle game where you need to make up different figures from a number of given shaped blocks. Take the block, rotate if needed and put it into the outlined figure to fill it. Repeat until all the blocks will be revealed.

name: Code Name: Romance
description:
“If you want, you can have everything.”

The terrible terror that happened 10 years ago: a group of criminals gathered and named themselves ‘Doomsday’. What is it that’s hidden behind that mysterious day and the ‘unknown’ who you have been longing for so long?! What would you do if you are the daughter of a legendary agent and you are meant to be a hero and subdue the villain?

"Don't forget, I wouldn't ever forget about you."

The choice between the villain and the hero, make your choice in Code Name: Romance!

name: The DioField Chronicle: Digital Deluxe Edition
description: A gritty and immersive story brought to life with the latest technology. Introducing "Real Time Tactical Battle" (RTTB), a new, deeply strategic, real-time battle system.

name: Climb and Fight: Mafia
description: Lots of action, shooting, enemies and different mechanics of collecting money await you in this challenging 2D platform action game with retro art. Control one of the Tornelo brothers in search of revenge in the city taken over by mobsters.

name: Employee of the Month
description: An atmospheric retro inspired survival horror game. Enjoy the late shift at 'The Month' in an abstract and unsettling night of terror, spooks and convenience.

name: Unknown Number: A First Person Talker
description: A phone call from a stranger. A daring heist in the middle of the North Sea. A chance to save the world using nothing but your voice. Unknown Number is voice-controlled adventure game. And it's the first of it's kind. Will you answer the call?

name: Fech the Ferret
description: Fech The Ferret is a fast and loud parkour game about a (cute) pink ferret. Go run around, sometimes to the beat of electronic music. Make your own path and explore with Fech the region of Marmocle as you meet other friendly animals in this vast world.

name: Squad 51 vs. the Flying Saucers
description: UFOs! Aliens! Aircrafts! Resistance! SHOOT 'EM UP! Squad 51 vs. the Flying Saucers is a spaceship shooter with 2D gameplay and 3D environment. Enjoy a smart combination of a fast-paced shooting experience and the 1950's sci-fi movies aesthetic, with live-action cutscenes.

name: Electrician Simulator
description: Take over the family business from your Dad and become an electrician. Learn the basics and test your skills in the Electrician Simulator. Repair and assemble sockets, panels, strips, plugs, chandeliers and even change light bulbs. Oh... and don't mix up the wires! Results might be shocking.

name: Construction Simulator: Customization Kit
description: The construction site is your runway, so pimp your helmets and bring some color to your construction work! The Customization Kit contains additional styles for your personal protection equipment. Customize your helmets with 9 different fun and colorful designs, ranging from fiery flames to classy dots, and choose from a selection of ear protection and glasses.

name: Construction Simulator: Car & Bobblehead Pack
description: As its name already suggests, the Car & Bobblehead Pack contains two cool new additions for your Construction Simulator game: Buckle up and unleash the power of the DLC’s exclusive sports car painted in a vibrant shade of orange that'll leave a trail of pixelated dust in your wake as you drive across the two huge maps. Plus, this add-on provides you with a co-pilot in the form of a bobblehead of your good friend Hape, which is automatically placed on the virtual dashboard of select vehicles.

name: Low Frequency
description:
After a catastrophe you are left adrift on your old ship hoping to find life.

Although not human...

name: Witch
description:
Help the witch to enter her house in this short puzzle-adventure side-scroller.

Created for the Cozy Autumn Game Jam 2022.

name: God of Riffs: Battle for the Metalverse
description: Story mode, new tracks, and tons of improvements!

name: Five Nights at Freddy's: Security Breach - Chaos Mod
description: Welcome to the Chaos Mod, chaos in its purest form! This is just pure chaos, there are a total of over 30 random events! Lots of surprises are waiting for you. So are you ready, Gregory?

name: Kingdom of Paradise
description: Experience Kingdom of Paradise originally released on the PSP system, enhanced with up-rendering, rewind, quick save, and custom video filters.

name: Pocket Land
description: Get ready to discover a world full of farming fun, where you can collect and sell crops with just one finger control, upgrade your character, and harvest like a pro.

name: Popgoes: Lost Dreams
description:
One year after the death of beloved inventor Fritz Glade, an old friend gets trapped in the abandoned pizzeria. Will she survive, or will she follow in the creator's footsteps?

Popgoes: Lost Dreams is a fanmade sequel to Popgoes by Kane Carter. The game features three different chapters, free-roam gameplay, new characters and a whole bunch of jumpscares.

name: Fall Guys: Plush Fox Pack
description:
Cuddle up to the competition with this adorable hoodie!

Includes:
Plushfox (Whole Costume)
600 x Show-Bucks!

name: Stray: Iam8bit Exclusive Edition
description: A limited edition release of Stray which includes a special cover, poster, art cards, and a patch, released via iam8bit.

name: Chicken Killer
description: "Chicken Killer" is a horror/comedy game based on the trashy horror movies of the 80's. Inspired by the low-budget chinese horror films.

name: Rooftop
description: Rooftop is an English Yume Nikki fangame where you explore Lani's dream world. The goal of the game is to explore and obtain effects.

name: SnowRunner: Western Star Wolf Pack
description: This content requires the base game SnowRunner on Steam in order to play.Expand your SnowRunner garage with the Wolf Pack, a collection of Western Star&rsquos latest and most versatile trucks! Get the 57X, the 47X and a 47X variant, as well as exclusive cosmetics in a single DLC!Not included in the Year 1 Pass or Year 2 Pass.

name: Stellaris: Toxoids Species Pack
description: Sin descripción

name: Satisfactory: Update 6
description: Sin descripción

name: Trash Horror Collection 2
description: This collection has 11 short horror games that you can freely choose which one you want to play.

name: Car Mats
description: Have fun playing on different types of car mats! Drive in a police car, be chased by them, race in speedboats, avoid trains, ride the bumper cars and more! Fun for all ages!

name: Hazelight Bundle
description:
Two exclusively co-op adventures best played with friends!
Help each other through unexpected obstacles and laugh-out-loud moments to fix a fractured relationship in It Takes Two.
Play the role of one of two prisoners making their daring escape from prison in A Way Out.

name: CubeShot
description: CubeShot is a fascinating first-person multiplayer shooter game with block graphics, in which you will enter a battlefield full of ruthless players. This free online game on offers you spectacular duels against other players, in the middle of a war zone to put your killer instinct to the test.

name: Construction Simulator: Extended Edition
description: Construction Simulator is back - bigger and better than ever! Take charge of over 90 machines, dozens of them brand new to the franchise, and build to your heart's content on two huge maps - on your own or with your friends!

name: Syphon Filter 2
description: A port of Syphon Filter 2, a third-person shooter stealth game originally released on the PlayStation console, enhanced with up-rendering, rewind, quick save, and custom video filters.

name: Shape of the Toilet Rim
description: A single player arcade-like game where you crush Toilet Cars driven by small suns. See how high of a score you can get!

name: Stellaris: Toxoids
description: Rise from the primordial ooze all the way to the stars! The Toxoids Species Pack gives players the chance to inhabit toxic worlds, gamble the future of their planets for immediate gains, and make the tough sacrifices necessary to survive a hostile galaxy.

name: Fit Puzzle Blocks
description: Solve a lot of puzzles in Fit Block Puzzle. Try to fit all the different shaped blocks on the grid.

name: Burger Butt
description: Burger Butt is a casual, side-scrolling, survival game where you dodge traps like lasers and missiles. How do you dodge? By sharting of course! You do this all while wearing silly hats and collecting coins to unlock even more hats!

name: The Doll's Window
description: A horror exploration game that takes place in an underground labyrinth. Avoid malicious creations that are hungry for your soul. Depart from the nightmares that constantly haunt you.

name: 2MD: VR Football Unleashed All Star
description: 2MD: VR Football Unleashed All Star is the massive sequel to the groundbreaking motion-controlled VR football game, 2MD: VR Football. Draw the plays and throw, hand-off, catch, and run the ball before the clock runs out!

name: Italian Journey: Nitro
description: Join this Italian Journey thorough the Italy in the pimped car with nitro. Enjoy the graphics with the best tunes.

name: Live Cycling Manager 2022
description: Live Cycling Manager 2022 is the ultimate cycling manager game. Select or create the club of your dreams and manage each and every aspect! Become the Sports Manager of a professional team and compete against another 40 teams until you reach the top.

name: Lucky Tlhalerwa: IMS Death Squad
description: IMS Death Squad is A Third-Person Story-Telling Action Shooter. Its Story Takes Place At The Same Time As The Original Super Incursion. SGT David Grimes Tries To Save His Team As Their Commander Has To Kill Them All, As A Requirement To Complete His Transition Into The Enemy Side.

name: Holiday with Gwen
description: Step into the shoes of detective Hank and his sidekick Gwen. This time on a top secret mission in an exotic Mediterranean-like country to uncover an illegal drug trade, but also to use this opportunity to enjoy themselves and perhaps even to savour romantic moments.

name: Race Day Rampage
description: Welcome to Race Day Rampage, a social arcade racing game built for streamers and their audience. In the game, you take on the role of Race Director. You pick the tracks, invite your audience and control the race. Cinematic camera controls let you zoom in on specific racers or areas, or zoom out and watch the race from afar. At the same time, the tracks have various traps that you can control to add to the chaos and influence the race!

name: Construction Simulator
description: Construction Simulator is back - bigger and better than ever! Get back to work and help yourself to a huge fleet of vehicles that will blow your mind. In addition to the brands already familiar from other games in the Construction Simulator series, such as Caterpillar, CASE and BELL, you can now take the wheel of new licensed construction machines from partners such as DAF and Doosan and choose from a total of over 70 construction machines!

name: Soulstice: Deluxe Edition
description:
Soulstice: Deluxe Edition includes:
Soulstice Full game
Digital Soundtrack
Digital Artbook
Ashen Blade Item Pack

name: Areigna Tactics
description:
Areigna Tactics is a top-down hex based strategy game taking place in the world of Areigna, a fantasy world of Humans, Goblins, Dwarfs, and much more. Play in this multiplayer real time strategy game online in ranked matches with people all around the world.

Unlike many strategy games which are based on resources held and build times, Areigna’s gameplay and balance focuses instead on cooldowns. These cooldowns vary across different units, and their attack and movement. You will need to balance these cooldowns and constraints in your building of new units, as well in the actions you command your units making their way to the enemy nexus.

name: Anno 1800: Empire of the Skies
description:
Using the latest construction materials from the New World, you can build a variety of new specialized airships.

Optimize your logistical network by transferring goods and workers between your islands in the New World, and keep your people connected with the new mail system.

Your tactical planning will also take on a whole new dimension as you and your competitors vie for aerial mastery.

name: Outrace
description: Outrace revives the pseudo-3D racing genre with a vibrant colour palette and synthwave soundtrack.Enjoy the iconic sights, sounds, tracks and cars of the arcade age.

name: Amnesia: Day One Edition Dual Pack
description:
In Amnesia: Memories, players will wake up as the mysterious Heroine, who has no memory of who she is. A friendly spirit named Orion will appear to help you regain your memories as you explore your world and remember those closest to you.

Amnesia: Memories Features:

Paths of Love - Select one of five guys as your love interest, each with multiple branching story paths. Each choice creates a distinct world where characters assume different roles, allowing for 20+ endings!
Show Your Affection - Parameters affect your relationship with your future love. Keep track of your relationship here and make sure you’re not headed to a bad ending!
Love of the Game - Play mini-games like Rock, Paper, Scissors and Air Hockey against other characters.
Love is Worth A Thousand Words - Unlock voiced images in the Gallery. Touching certain areas of the image will play dialogue of feelings that couldn’t be previously expressed.
